name: freakland
description:
this is freakland! Just a surreal dream world full of random assets, not really a game.

The only thing you can do is to wander around this surreal level and explore a very badly designed terrain with scattered random assets, most with wrong proportions.

This is one of my first experiments made with Unity back in 2016. I just found it in a lost folder and I think it is special because it was my first build with a menu screen!

I know it is not much but I was just trying to see if I could build something in one afternoon and make an executable file out of it.

Big thanks to all the asset creators!  Give me a shout!

:D
